NewsEntity.Content: Initial release
Superheater 0.3.0 released. You will need to download and install this update manually from Github. Sorry for inconvenience.

Added: Tomb Raider Legend: Crash Fix, Ultrawide Fix, No Into Fix Tomb Raider Anniversary: Ultrawide Fix, No Intro Fix Timeshift: Crash Fix, No Intro Fix Hitman Codename 47: Widescreen Fix, No Intro Fix Hitman Silent Assassin: Censorship Fix, Widescreen Fix, No Intro Fix Hitman Contracts: Widescreen Fix, No Intro Fix Hitman Blood Money: Widescreen Fix, No Intro Fix

Added: FarCry Fix Fallout 2 Restoration Project v27
Updated: Fallout 2 Unofficial Patch to v27 Falout 1 Fixt

Added: Doom 3 / RoE: dhewm3, The Lost Mission, Custom resolution autoexec Prey 2006: Graphics Settings Fix, Ultrawide Fix Quake 4: Graphics Settings Fix, Ultrawide Fix Redneck Rampage / Rides Again: Raze port Blood: Raze, NotBlood ports Powerslave DOS: Raze port NAM: Raze port World War II GI: Raze port GTA IV: dxvk
Added: Fallout 1: Et Tu Deus Ex: Deus Exe Disciples 2: GL Wrapper Duke Nukem Mahnattan Project: Enhanced Edition Desperados: Resolution Fix
Updated: Fallout 2 Unofficial Patch to v28 Fallout 2 Restoration Project to v28 Dark Forces The Force Engine to v1.09.500
Added: Wolfenstein 3D: ECWolf source port Vampire: The Masquerade - Bloodlines: Mandatory Fixes, Unofficial Patch Basic and Plus Freedom Force + FF vs the 3rd Reich: Universal Widescreen Fix

Added: Callisto Protocol: No Intro Fix Dawn of War + Winter Assault: (Ultra)Widescreen Fix Dawn of War + Addons: Camera Zoom Mod Nier Automata: NAOMI Hyperdimension Neptunia Re;Birth 1, 2, 3: Neptastic Mod

Added: Return to Castle Wolfenstein: Unofficial Patch No intro fixes for Bound by Flame, DarkStar One, Enclave, Of Orcs And Men, Velvet Assassin
Updated: Ultrawide fixes for Tomb Rider Legend and Anniversary

Added: Crazy Taxi: SilentPatch Gun: Widescreen Fix
No intro fixes for Demonicon, Fable - The Lost Chapters, Killer is Dead, Mars: War Logs, Remember Me, Rise of the Argonauts, STAR WARS Jedi Knight, Jedi Academy, The Technomancer

Added: Legacy of Kain Blood Omen 2: Re-vamped, No intro Legacy of Kain Defiance: Widescreen Fix, No intro Legacy of Kain Soul Reaver: sr1patch, No Intro Legacy of Kain Soul Reaver 2: Soul Fixer, Enhancer

Added: Deus Ex: Human Revolution - Director's Cut: Crash Fix, Gold Filter Restoration Deus Ex: Invisible War: Visible Upgrade Dead Island / Riptide Definitive Edition: Essential Fix Official DRM-Free Patches for Chantelise, Recettear, Tropico 3

Added: Flatout 1/2: ZPatch Arx Fatalis: Arx Libertatis Crysys / Crysis Wars: C1-Launcher Fortune Summoners: Performance Fix Deadly Premonition: dpfix, Ultrawide Fix No Intro Fixes for: Alien Isolation, Castlevania: Lords of Shadow 1/2

Added: Assassin's Creed 1/2: Eagle Patch Psychonauts: Widescreen Fix Kingpin: Unofficial Patch Sniper Elite: Widescreen Fix Just Cause: Widescreen Fix No Intro Fixes for: Assassin's Creed 1, Borderlands 2, Dishonored 1/2/DotO, Psychonauts
Added: Manhunt: Fixer, MHP Septerra Core: SR

Superheater 0.6.0 is deprecated and won't get any new fixes.
Update to 0.7.0
No Intro Fixes for: Broken Sword 1, Darksiders Warmastered Edition, Darksider 2 Deathinitive Edition, Parkan 2, Risen 1/2/3, Two Worlds Epic Edition, Two Worlds 2 HD

Added: Alien Isolation: Save confirmation dialog skipper, MotherVR Batman: Arkham Asylum GOTY Edition: Advanced Launcher, No Intro Fix Batman: Arkham City GOTY: Advanced Launcher, No Intro Fix Binary Domain, Mouse Improvement Mod
Fixed Max Payne 3 ASI Loader
Added: Batman: Arkham Asylum GOTY Edition: Official PS3 DLCs Dark Souls 3: Proper PC Experience Mod
Added: Thief Gold: TFix Thief II: T2Fix Thief: Deadly Shadows: Sneaky Upgrade Killing Time: Community Patch
Added: Crash Bandicoot™ N. Sane Trilogy: Ultrawide Fix, No Intro Fix Spyro™ Reignited Trilogy: Ultrawide Fix, No Intro Fix The Bureau: XCOM Declassified: No Intro Fix

Added: Tomb Raider I: TR1X + Unfinished Business Tomb Raider II: TR2Main + Golden Mask Tomb Raider III: tomb3 + The Lost Artefact
No Intro Fixes for: Red Faction 2, RoboCop: Rogue City, Sleeping Dogs DE, Sudeki, The Talos Principle 2, Tomb Raider 1,2,3,4,5
Added: Tomb Raider IV: tomb4 + The Times Exclusive Level Tomb Raider V: tomb5 Tomb Raider VI: No Intro Fix
Added: Blood II: The Chosen: Ultimate Fix Duke Nukem 3D: Raze Shadow Warrior (Classic): Raze + Addons

Added: FINAL FANTASY XIII/XIII-2 : FF13Fix The Longest Journey: ScummVM RoboCop Rogue City: Ultrawide Fix
No Intro Fixes for: Bayonetta, Etherlords 1/2, Gorky 17, Red Faction Guerrilla Re-Mars-tered, The Dark Eye: Chains of Satinav, Cyberdimension Neptunia: 4 Goddesses Online
Added: FINAL FANTASY X/X-2 HD Remaster: Launcher+ Updated Raze to 1.8.1 for Duke 3D, Shadow Warrior, Redneck Rampage, Blood, NAM, WWII GI

Superheater versions before 0.10.0 are deprecated and won't get any new fixes. Update to 0.10.0
Added: Caesar 3: Julius, Augustus Prince of Persia: The Two Thrones: Launcher Fix Prince of Persia: Warrior Within: Launcher Fix Tomb Raider: Underworld: Ultrawide Fix Bound by Flame: Yellow Visual Glitch on UI Fix Broken Sword 1: Better In-Game Font
Updated: Tomb Raider 1: TR1X to v3.0.2

Added: Resident Evil / Resident Evil 0: Fusion Fix Blood Fresh Supply: NotBlood, Raze Prototype: Ultimate Fix, Ultimate Fix for AMD SiN Gold: Dominatrix
Updated: Grand Theft Auto IV: FusionFix to v2.0 Manhunt: Fixer to v2.0, MPH to v1.2

Fixes' descriptions now support markdown. Descriptions will display incorrectly in Superheater lower than 0.11.0.
Added: Assassin's Creed: Freezes Fix, Black Bars Fix for Ultrawide The First Templar: Launcher Skip
Updated: Grand Theft Auto IV: FusionFix to v2.1 Star Wars Dark Forces: Force Engine to v1.09.540 Crysis / Crysis Wars: C1-Launcher to v5

Added: Call of Juarez: Black Bars Removal, Ultrawide Fix Disciples II: Rise of the Elves: GL Wrapper PowerSlave Exhumed: Fixes Collection, No Intro Fix Red Faction: Dash Faction
Ultrawide Fixes for: Blasphemous, Hollow Knight
No Intro Fixes for: Dead Rising 2 / Off the Record, En Garde!
Updated: Manhunt: MPH to v1.2a
Format of the fixes database has been changed once again. Superheater versions lower than 0.12.0 won't receive any new fixes. Update ASAP.
